All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCollider
    AbstractCollider objects represent shapes that can be used to test interactions.
    AbstractScene
    AbstractScene objects represents different game stages.
    Actor
    Actor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input.
    Behaviour
    The Behaviour class is what objects in an AbstractScene derive from.
    Camera
    Camera acts as a pseudo-camera that defines where the origin of a frame is.
    Origin rests at the bottom-left of the screen.
    Component
    Component objects are items that can appended to Pawn objects to extend functionality.
    Console
    The Console class helps log information to the console to aid with communication and problems.
    Core
    The Core class handles logic, rendering, and input of a game.
    CoreTime
    The Time class represents the details of the Core object's CPU time.
    CursorPosition
    CursorPosition allows for ease-of-computation for cursor position between the screen and the game world.
    DrawComponent
    DrawComponent objects are Component objects that render images over their parent Pawn object.
    Editor
    The Editor class runs and initialises all necessary functions to run the editor.
    EditorWindow
    The EditorWindow object is the interface that is interacted with for developing in sontana.
    GameSystem
    GameSystem objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are not rendered.
    InputManager
    The InputManager class manages the inputs for Actor objects.
    This class should not be interacted with normally.
    Pawn
    Pawn objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered.
    Position
    The Position class represents a point in 2D space.
    RectCollider
    RectCollider objects represent AbstractCollider objects with a rectangular shape.
    SceneManager
    SceneManager handles the switching, loading, and referencing of AbstractScene objects.
    SceneManagerException
    The SceneManagerException class represents exceptions that appear when mishandling AbstractScene objects.
    StateMachine
    StateMachine objects represent different states and are globally accessible.
    Toolbox
    The Toolbox class contains various methods that perform common functions.
    UIActor
    UIActor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input.
